description: While walking around for Pokémon Orienteering in Vermilion City, the kids he was with saw this Farfetch`d walking across the road. Goh initial two attempts to catch it with a Poké Ball failed as it used its leek like a baseball bat to hit the balls away. On the third sighting at the end of the day, he used a change up through which made Farfetch`d swing and miss the Poké Ball, allowing Goh to catch it.
name: Kamonegi (Gou)
